00024 class CModel {
00025   public:
00026     /**
00027     *Create an empty model: 0 vertices and 0 facets
00028     */
00029     CModel();
00030     /**Destroy the model*/
00031     ~CModel();
00032     /**
00033     *A copy constructor
00034     */
00035     CModel(const CModel & m);
00036     /**
00037     *Load the specified off file 
00038     */
00039     void LoadModel(char * fname);
00040     /**
00041     *Save the current model in off formate
00042     */
00043     void SaveModel(char *fname);
00044     /**
00045     *Normalize the current model
00046     */
00047     void Normalize();
00048     /**
00049     *Calculate the spherical harmonic coefficiets for a certain face using \f$ C^r_{l,m}=\int\int_T Y_l^m(\theta,\varphi)\sin(\theta)d\theta d\varphi \f$
00050     */
00051     void FacetHarmonics(int fh, int bw, double r, gsl_complex *coeff);
00052     /**
00053     *Calculate the spherical harmonic coefficiets for all faces
00054     */
00055     void AllFacetHarmonics(int bw, double r, gsl_complex *coeff);
00056     int Facets_no();
00057     int Vertices_no();
00058   private:
00059     /**
00060     *The number of points
00061     */ 
00062     int p_no;
00063     /**
00064     *The number of facets
00065     */
00066     int f_no;
00067     /**
00068     *The list of points
00069     */
00070     Point_3 *plist;
00071     /**
00072     *The list of facets
00073     */
00074     int *flist;
